bugs.description: Possible nil pointer dereference: config.ManagementURL may be nil for older or malformed config files. The code calls config.ManagementURL.String() without nil check at line 240, which will panic.

Potential nil pointer dereference: config.ManagementURL may be nil (e.g., in very old config files). Subsequent calls like config.ManagementURL.Hostname() (line 408) assume it is non-nil and will panic.
generateKey() panics on error instead of returning it, which will crash the entire program. Errors should be propagated to the caller instead of using panic.

Potential nil pointer dereference: config.ManagementURL is accessed without nil check (e.g., config.ManagementURL.Scheme at line 129). If configManagementURL is nil due to malformed/old config, this will panic.
